strapiPost.title: Get A Look At The 2022-23 Razorback Men’s Basketball Team
strapiPost.content:
With a highly anticipated season approaching, fans can get a sneak peak at the Razorback Men’s Basketball team during the Red-White Scrimmage this Sunday, Oct 16, at Barnhill Arena. 

  • The schedule: The remainder of the 2022-23 non-conference schedule has been released featuring some exciting matchups with Oklahoma, Baylor, and the Maui Invitational tournament.
  • The line-up: Musselman’s team roster is stacked this year with four returning players and 11 newcomers, including five transfers and six highly-sought after freshmen recruits. 

Find more info about Razorbacks Men’s Basketball HERE.
